bpm.gateway.core.manager
Class ResourceManager

java.lang.Object
  bpm.gateway.core.manager.ResourceManager

public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a container of all Resources(for now only Server definitions) The content of this class will be added in the xml definition of the model, but can be saved alone as a repository of server. Only one instance is allowed.

Author:
LCA
